text: @realDonaldTrump We have 15 cases and soon be ZERO & Anyone who wants a Test can get a Test. So let’s take about fake news!! And how about how serious you & your family Take the Coronavirus - I guess there where only 10 people at this party?? https://t.co/16Zp6LRaIb
